hero.note: Free forever. No ads. No tracking.

step1.title: Data Collection and Processing
step1.description: GoalBlip collects important information such as past matches, league standings and various statistics of football teams by scanning the internet. This data includes match details, team statistics and player information.

step2.title: Data Analysis
step2.description: The collected data is processed by GoalBlip's powerful analysis engines. Various factors such as home and away performance, recent performance status and player health conditions are taken into account.

step3.title: Analysis and Table Creation
step3.description: The analyzed data is processed using various algorithms and models, and detailed analyses such as potential match results and performance tables are created.

step4.title: User Interaction
step4.description: Users can directly view results from the detailed tables prepared by GoalBlip or access customized views by making their own analyses.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.a1: Yes, GoalBlip is completely free to use. There are no premium features, subscriptions, or hidden costs. We believe football analysis should be accessible to everyone.
faq.a2: GoalBlip does not collect any personal data. All information (favorites, language preferences, timezone) is stored locally on your device only. We don't track you, and we don't share your data with anyone.
faq.a3: GoalBlip tracks over 50 leagues worldwide, including Premier League, La Liga, Serie A, Bundesliga, Ligue 1, and many more. We continuously add new leagues based on user demand.
faq.a4: GoalBlip uses advanced data analysis and AI algorithms to provide comprehensive match statistics. These are analytical insights based on historical data and should not be considered as predictions or guarantees.
faq.q5: Do I need an internet connection?
faq.a5: An internet connection is required to fetch the latest match data. However, previously viewed matches are cached locally, so you can access them offline.
faq.q6: When will the app be available?
faq.a6: GoalBlip will be available on the App Store (iOS) and Play Store (Android) soon. Follow us for updates and be among the first to download!

intro.title: Introduction
intro.text: GoalBlip ("we", "our", or "us") is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your information when you use our mobile application.

local.title: Information Stored Locally on Your Device
local.intro: GoalBlip stores the following information only on your device using local storage (AsyncStorage):
local.favoritesDesc: Match IDs that you mark as favorites
local.languageDesc: Your selected language (Turkish, English, Spanish, German)
local.importantDesc: This information is stored locally on your device and is never transmitted to our servers or any third parties.

not.title: Information We Do NOT Collect
not.personal: Personal identification information (name, email, phone number)
not.identifiable: Any data that can identify you personally

use.title: How We Use Your Information
use.intro: The information stored locally on your device is used solely to:
use.preferences: Maintain your language and timezone preferences
use.experience: Provide a personalized experience within the app

storage.title: Data Storage and Security
storage.local: All data is stored locally on your device using secure local storage
storage.noTransmit: No data is transmitted to external servers
storage.noShare: No data is shared with third parties
storage.delete: You can delete all stored data by uninstalling the app

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Services
thirdParty.intro: GoalBlip connects to our own API server to fetch match data and statistics. This connection:
thirdParty.noPersonal: Does not transmit any personal information
thirdParty.public: Only requests publicly available match data

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.delete: Delete all stored data by uninstalling the app
rights.clear: Clear app data through your device settings
rights.stop: Stop using the app at any time

children.title: Children's Privacy
children.text: GoalBlip is not intended for children under the age of 13. We do not knowingly collect information from children.

changes.title: Changes to This Privacy Policy
changes.text: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by updating the "Last Updated" date.
